[{'institution_name': 'Immerse · Full-time', 'linkedin_url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/18512349/', 'website': None, 'industry': None, 'type': None, 'headquarters': None, 'company_size': None, 'founded': None, 'from_date': 'Mar 2018', 'to_date': 'Present', 'description': 'Once upon a time the only way to experience the power and joy of language immersion was to spend thousands of dollars and countless hours living in a foreign country.

Then the Metaverse changed everything. Immerse was able to create virtual worlds with real live guides to bring you into cultural immersion. You can transport yourself to an airport in Mexico City or a bar in Guatemela in mere seconds, experiencing what it would feel like to actually be there.

Through Immerse and Virtual Reality, language immersion is available to all. 

Let’s get started.
Once upon a time the only way to experience the power and joy of language immersion was to spend thousands of dollars and countless hours living in a foreign country. If you wanted to learn a new language through immersion, you would have to spend your time struggling through awkward conversations and difficult moments in hopes that you would pick up bits and pieces of the language. Then the Metaverse changed everything. Immerse was able to create virtual worlds with real live guides to bring you into cultural immersion. You can transport yourself to an airport in Mexico City or a bar in Guatemela in mere seconds, experiencing what it would feel like to actually be there. As a result, more people are experiencing the benefits of language immersion without the expensive and time-consuming reality of living in a foreign country.
